articles.author: April Ryder
articles.title: New Lifeform Discovered Inside Human Guts - Giant Freakin Robot
articles.description: It's well-known that humans are host to microscopic lifeforms which is why scientists to find a whole new type of life inside of us!

articles.title: Global cancer cases expected to increase 77 percent by 2050: WHO report - The Hill
articles.description: The World Health Organization expects global cancer cases to increase 77 percent by 2050, according to a new report from the U.N. agency. The data released Friday by the organization’s International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC), examined 2022 data for…

articles.author: Nicoletta Lanese
articles.title: Severe 'flesh-eating' infections tied to heat waves in eastern US, CDC reports - Livescience.com
articles.description: Scientists investigated flesh-eating infections that took place after record-breaking heat waves in the U.S. last year.
articles.content:
In the wake of record-breaking heat waves
 in the summer of 2023, three East Coast states saw upticks in severe, "flesh-eating" infections, a new report says.
The report concerns Vibrio vulnificus,… [+3063 chars]

articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Scientists see an ultra-fast movement on surface of HIV virus - Medical Xpress
articles.description: As the HIV virus glides up outside a human cell to dock and possibly inject its deadly cargo of genetic code, there's a spectacularly brief moment in which a tiny piece of its surface snaps open to begin the process of infection.
